channel.title: sci-fi on C. Ager
channel.description: Recent content in sci-fi on C. Ager

item.title: More Hitchhikers Guide
item.description: The BBC aired a Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy: Hexagonal Phase. One can listen to it even out of country for a month. Stephen Hawkings voicebox did speak the part of the guide.

item.title: Interstellar
item.description: War gestern im Film Interstellar. Der war sehr gute Science Fiction. Endlich mal wieder.
